description:
After cleverly saving himself from an instant death, Goku is itching to find out the nature of Hit’s abilities. Will Goku’s deductions prevent his untimely destruction?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hangeki Naruka!? Mienai Koroshi no Waza!!
Kommt es zum Gegenangriff? - Die unsichtbare Todestechnik!
Will There Be a Counterattack?! The Invisible Killing Strike!!
¿Habrá un contraataque? ¡Una técnica invisible y fatal!
反撃なるか!? 見えない殺しの技!!
